There are a lot of troubling things going on with these activists finding willing audiences in corrupt politicians like Kathleen Wynne.  Just as they are trying to censor this brilliant and refreshing documentary on Dr. Zucker, (I'd encourage you to look into this heroic professional who was black listed by these career, taxpayer bleeding, social justice warriors and militant activists), they did the same thing with the Ontario Sex Ed curriculum. If you don't go along you're branded a homophobe or ignorant, but ask them for any scientific evidence and they'll trot out some junk science and personally attack you.

Dear Reader,

I am writing to you today about a grave matter that has been brought to my attention. It seems that there are certain individuals who are attempting to silence Dr. Zucker, a respected psychiatrist and researcher who has dedicated his life to helping those struggling with gender dysphoria. These activists are trying to ban his documentary, "Gender Identity: A New Way of Seeing," from being shown in public, and they are using false accusations of "conversion therapy" to justify their actions.

It is clear to me that these individuals have an agenda, and they are willing to go to any lengths to promote their own political views. They are not interested in helping those who are struggling with gender dysphoria; they are only interested in pushing their own agenda and silencing anyone who disagrees with them.

I am writing to you today to urge you to speak out against this injustice. Please sign our petition and share it with your friends and family. Together, we can make sure that Dr. Zucker's documentary is not banned from being shown in public. We can also send a message to these activists that their attempts to silence those who disagree with them will not be tolerated.

Thank you for your time and consideration.

Sincerely,
